title: Outlaw
description: The sexy, action-packed first book in The City of a Thousand Lies trilogy by award-winning Imogen Keeper.IN THE PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC of the Northern Americas, the population is ruled with draconian force, monitored by nanochips, divided by status.Citizens obey. Outlaws are hunted down in the streets.RECENT GRADUATE Tierney Jones wants one thing—to live out her quiet obedient life in the safety of anonymity.When her thesis presentation garners unwanted attention however, the government issues Tierney an impossiblecommand—test mind control.FOR A TEST SUBJECT, they give her Romeo-Three, bio-engineered captive soldier, as dangerous as he isirresistible, with a reckless hope and outrageous wit that stir a long-dead longing inside her. Three hasgoals of his own—escape amid fire and blood. He wants revenge for the wrongs done to him and his captivebio-engineered brothers and sisters, and he will have it. The plan is set. The fuse is lit. Nothing and noone will stop him.THERE’S JUST ONE PROBLEM, Tierney Jones with her clipboard, and her codes and her sexy black glasses, standsright smack in his path to freedom. No one else has ever looked past the soldier of him and seen the man.HE IS CAPTIVE. She is jailor. Their love is an act of war. The price tag of his freedom is her life, leavingthem with no choice but to rebel—even if rebellion means certain death.A seductive, breathtaking book that blends romance, urban fantasy and futuristic elements into an unforgettable read.
author: Imogen Keeper
